text: A wide screen just makes a bad film twice as bad.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

text: A good film is when the price of the dinner, the theatre admission and the babysitter were worth it.
author: Alfred Hitchcock

text: So, where's the Cannes Film Festival being held this year?
author: Christina Aguilera

text: Cinema is the most beautiful fraud in the world.
author: Jean-Luc Godard

text: A lot of movies are about life, mine are like a slice of cake.
author: Alfred Hitchcock
